summary: Another in my line of Crests Mods
descriptionHtml:
This was a request by \'scottmack\' who asked that i replace the Stormcloak Rebels and Windhelm Guards default outfits with that of the Clan MacKenzie. 

The Leather Studded under-armor is from another of my mods called \'Tartan Stormcloaks\'. the only reason this is NOT in that file is because it also includes a new shield texture with the MacKenzie Crest on it.

Please post your thoughts and feedback (but seriously, please refrain from posting stupid comments like \'it would look better without the crest\' ok, look at the title of the mod before you post that)

as always im open to requests, please PRIVATE MESSAGE them. commented requests will more then likely be ignored.

Permissions:

if for any reason you want to use parts of this or any other of my mods, ask permission. give me credits and a link to the finished product.

Additional:

i have heard about some of my mods being posted on other websites, i have only ever uploaded them on the Nexus. so for your own PC\'s safety, and to avoid any kind of virus, only download them from the Nexus.

Callaghan04
author: Callaghan04
